text:
Marta Ferrari (born 9 June 1991) is an Italian rugby union player and judoka. She was a member of the Italy women's national rugby union team and Italy women's national rugby sevens team. She took part the 2012 FIRA Women's European Championship, 2013 Summer Universiade, 2013 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2014 Women's Six Nations Championship, and 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup.
She played for the French club in Rennes.

annotations.surface_form: Italy women's national rugby union team
Italy women's national rugby sevens team
